comment.author: 27398485@N08
comment._content: Abu Simbel Great Hall Osiride or Osirid statues of Ramses II - holding sceptre and flail of royalty - duplicate image found at: oi.uchicago.edu/gallery/pa_egypt_bees_abu_simbel/ From 1905-06 Breasted Expeditions to Egypt & Sudan Vulture Goddess, Mut on ceiling - she was wife of Amun Ra or Amon Re - Chief of all the Gods - www.egyptsites.co.uk/upper/abusimbel.html image has foxing damage, or mettalic deposit damage - Great definitions of Egyptian Gods - www.ancientegypt.co.uk/gods/explore/main.html

comment.author: 8099187@N06
comment._content: Ciao, sarebbe bello se condividessi questa foto nel gruppo Rupestre. Sei il benvenuto! Hi, What about adding your photo in Rupestre? You’re wellcome!
